title: "Follow the Science!": Holes in our Map are Damaging our Ability to Navigate in the World
description: Michael and Karen discuss the inherent weaknesses of what passes today for the scientific worldview - one that doesn't take into account the potential for flashes of insight or the necessity for a human-centered approach to the gathering and use of data. Also, the clash between administrators who make the rules and front-line doctors who come face to face with real, live, suffering people.
